flawed_nl_solution:
She works 8 hours a day at $16 an hour so she makes 8*16 = $<<8*16=128>>128 a day
She works this job 5 days a week so she makes 128*5 = $<<128*5=460>>460 in 5 days
She works 2 hours a day at $13.5 an hour so she makes 2*13.5 = $<<2*13.5=27>>27 a day
She works this job 5 days a week so she makes 27*5 = $<<27*5=135>>135
She makes $460 at her main job and $135 at her part-time job so all total she makes 460+135 = $<<460+135=595>>595 in 5 days
#### 595

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 640, not 460. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
